title: Invalid Database Objects / Geçersiz Veritabanı Objeleri
description: Identifies and reports all invalid or corrupted database objects that may cause runtime errors or performance issues

queries.sql: SELECT OWNER, OBJECT_NAME, OBJECT_TYPE, CREATED, LAST_DDL_TIME, STATUS FROM DBA_OBJECTS WHERE STATUS = 'INVALID' AND OWNER NOT IN ('SYS', 'SYSTEM') ORDER BY CREATED DESC

doc_hint: Zero invalid objects is the target state. Any invalid objects indicate compilation failures or schema inconsistencies. Investigate the owner schema and object type. May require recompilation or schema refresh.
analysis_prompt: Count total invalid objects. Group by object type and owner schema. If any invalid objects found, determine root cause and recommend recompilation or schema fix steps.
